mapper.insert: insert into postboard (boardseq, boardnm, boardusage, userid, board_dt) values (postboard_seq.nextval, #{boardnm}, #{boardusage}, #{userid}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update postboard set boardnm=#{boardnm}, boardusage=#{boardusage} where boardseq=#{boardseq}
mapper.delete: update postboard set boardusage='N' where boardseq=#{boardseq}
